item.title: Xapian
item.description: I offer commerical development support for Xapian since 2014. I have developed following capabolities in Xapian commerically: Decoupled indexing and text extraction which reduced indexing time for 1 million images from several days to a few hours. Enabled indexing of images using Optixal Character Recognition (OCR). Designed and implemented a heuristic algorithm to extract table from images. IBM used this module for fraud detection on images and pdfs.

item.title: News
item.description: Oct 22, 2019   Paper accepted at ALTA 2019 Jul 23, 2018   Started MS (CS) at The University of Melbourne with Prof. Timothy Baldwin and Afshin Rahimi

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I am Gaurav Arora. I am pursuing Masters of Science (Computer Science) under supervision of Prof. Timothy Baldwin. My research project in masters is focused on Catastrophic Forgetting in Neural Networks. We conducted a empirical study comparing different architecture like CNN, LSTM for forgetting. This work was recently published in ALTA 2019. I have been offering consultancy services for Xapian from 2014. All my xapian related projects are listed on this page.
